column2: "You're the best I've ever seen, killer! You did way better than I coulda ever predicted!"
"Now I see how to break through Goronzoran's defenses!"
"If you hit it as fast as you can, you'll crack that shell open in no time!"

"Hanging back and being cautious just makes fights take longer!
...Well, usually, probably."
"Now I can get better results fighting smarter, not harder! If I need anything else, I'll totally ask you first! Thanks!"
